page.title: 04EDUCATION IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: {ST MARY'S PRIMARY SCHOOL}IS A CHURCH OF ENGLAND SCHOOL OPENED IN{1974.}IT HAS FIFTY-SEVEN CHILDREN.THERE ARE THREE CLASSES.{MRS BELL}TAKES INFANT ONE,TWO AND THREE.{MRS GILL}TAKES JUNIOR ONE AND TWO.{MR TINGLE,}WHO IS THE HEADMASTER,AND{MRS FERGUSON}TAKE JUNIOR THREE AND FOUR. THE WORK WE DO IS TOPIC,HISTORY, GEOGRAPHY,MATHS,ENGLISH,P.E.,ART AND CRAFT,MUSIC AND R.E. {THE KITCHEN}OPENS ONTO THE HALL WHERE WE DINE.MOST CHILDREN STAY TO LUNCH. {THE ACCOMMODATION}CONSISTS OF FOUR TEACHING AREAS,A RESOURCES ROOM,A LIBRARY,TWO WET AREAS,FOUR QUIET AREAS AND A STAFFROOM AS WELL AS A HEADTEACHERS ROOM AND SEVERAL STORE ROOMS.THERE IS A PLAYING FIELD AND A YARD.
